source.name: ARMS Farm Financial and Crop Production Practices
source.description: The information provided here comes from the annual Agricultural Resource Management Survey (ARMS)-USDA's primary source of information on the financial condition, production practices, resource use, and the economic well-being of America's farm households. Sponsored jointly by ERS and the National Agricultural Statistics Service (NASS), ARMS is the only national survey that provides observations of field-level farm practices, the economics of the farm business, and the characteristics of the American farm household-all collected in a representative sample. Information about crop production, farm production, business, and households includes data for 15 selected States where available.
